00025 #ifndef _Rectangle_H__
00026 #define _Rectangle_H__
00027 
00028 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00029 
00030 namespace Ogre {
00031 
00032     struct _OgreExport Rectangle
00033     {
00034         Real left;
00035         Real top;
00036         Real right;
00037         Real bottom;
00038 
00039         inline bool inside(Real x, Real y) const { return x >= left && x <= right && y >= top && y <= bottom; }
00040     };
00041 
00051     inline Rectangle intersect(const Rectangle& lhs, const Rectangle& rhs)
00052     {
00053         Rectangle r;
00054 
00055         r.left   = lhs.left   > rhs.left   ? lhs.left   : rhs.left;
00056         r.top    = lhs.top    > rhs.top    ? lhs.top    : rhs.top;
00057         r.right  = lhs.right  < rhs.right  ? lhs.right  : rhs.right;
00058         r.bottom = lhs.bottom < rhs.bottom ? lhs.bottom : rhs.bottom;
00059 
00060         return r;
00061     }
00062 
00063 }
00064 
00065 #endif // _Rectangle_H__
